FlagStatusCanonicalMap (http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/sc-flag-status)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/flag-status to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-status

DRAFT. Published on 03/04/2018 12:05:46 PM by HL7 (FHIR Project) (http://hl7.org/fhir, fhir@lists.hl7.org).

Canonical Mapping for "Indicates whether this flag is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or entered in error."


Source CodeEquivalenceDestination Code
entered-in-errorequivalenterror
activeequivalentactive
inactiveequivalentinactive

title: Canonical Mapping for "null"
description: Canonical Mapping for "Indicates whether this flag is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or entered in error."
